name: Woogie's Mildly Spooky Shelter
description:
Uh oh, Woogie accidentally let the ghost orbs out in his shelter again, use your SUPER-GHOST-SUK 9000  to suck up all the orbs and save the day!

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Arrow Keys - Look
  • Space - Use Vacuum

Gamepad Controls:

  • Left Stick - Move
  • Right Stick - Look
  • Right Trigger - Use Vacuum
